Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 7.5 with a standard deviation 3.5. The z-score of the person with 7.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.4
* -0.05
* 0.11

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.4: Incorrect
-0.05: Incorrect
* 0.11: Correct
